ygData.subject: Nice place to hunt at lv 11 - 13
ygData.msgSnippet: I come to PAW at lv 12 and i found that there are excelelent place to go up level from 12 to 13 killing snakes with excelent loot i found in media 4.5 gold for
ygData.messageBody:
I come to PAW at lv 12 and i found that there are excelelent place to go
up level from 12 to 13 killing snakes with excelent loot i found in media
4.5 gold for a kill all time also geting experience ! Every now and then
comes sombody who wish to group with a wizard and you can lv fast. Much
much less trains than in other zones and i never seen more then 14 people
in. As this is also place where can be found a magic runed totem staffs and
snakeskin armour peaces you can make much money and god experience too. If
you hunt snakes you are out of a way wich pass a Nixx Nenix a deadly 25 -
30 ? lv necromancer wich come every now and then to kill all gnolls and all
players wich he found around. I sugest to come with full food and water as
nearest place to buy food is gypsy camp in north karana and there is all
full of patroling giants and griffons.

My tactic in this place is to bind me right out of entrance in paw and then
work my way to snake nests evoiding fights against more than one gnoll
guard at a time. if i go in trouble i gate fast right to entrance in s
karana . it is also nice to gate back after i selled my loot. Just brought
a Runed totem staff for 15 Plat !! and i have 2 snakeskin jackets and
gloves to sell. but i dont know wich price can i ask for them.

Ok its all from



Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
Fenin Ro


http://www.tip.it/wizard

moderator


mailto:_EQ_magic@onelist.com
